        @PostMapping(value="/get")
public Status sendCheckCode(@RequestParam
                                                       String mailAddress)
        Send a check code to the receiver
        Parameters:
        mailAddress - the uploaded mail address from the client.
        Returns:
        return a Status object with an argument true if send mail successfully, false otherwise.

      • verifyCheckCode

        @PostMapping(value="/verify")
public Status verifyCheckCode(@RequestParam
                                                            String mailAddress,
                                                            @RequestParam
                                                            String checkCode)
        Send a check code to the receiver
        Parameters:
        mailAddress - the uploaded mail address from the client.
        checkCode - the check code form the client
        Returns:
        return a Status object with an argument true if the check code is right, false otherwise.
